pullRequest.title: Make sure that IdFieldType#isAggregatable is accurate.
pullRequest.bodyText:
Before, it always returned 'true' even when the setting
"indices.id_field_data.enabled" was false.
Fixes #62897.

nodes.bodyText: I kept the deprecation message here so we don't issue a warning on every call to field caps.
